price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߦߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊߟߌߦߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߤߙߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߛߏ߬ߙߌ߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߍ ߡߊ߬
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَهُمۡ لَهَا سَٰبِقُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ulāika yusāriʿūna fī al-khayrāti wahum lahā sābiqūna
